DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Axial Stability Improving Gait Balance Performance Children With Dyskinetic Cerebral Palsy
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate effect TheraTogs orthotic undergarment strap system increase axial stability reflect improve balance walk performance child dyskinetic cerebral palsy . Forty child dyskinetic CP assign randomly two group ( A & B ) . Control group ( A ) receive conventional rehabilitation program postural correction 2 hours/3 session weekly/3 successive month . Study group ( B ) receive conventional rehabilitation program group ( A ) addition wear Thera Togs soft orthotic undergarment . Patients evaluation carry intervention program assess gait balance performance use Noraxons myo pressure plate Biodex balance system .
DOC.criteria: The level gross motor function select level I II accord Gross Motor Function Classification System ( GMFCS ) ; ability walk 10 independently without orthosis ; cognitively competent able understand follow instruction ; height 100 cm fit Biodex balance equipment . If participant use assistive mobility device ; GMFCS level III , IV , V ; fix contracture low limb musculature ; hip dislocation ; significant spinal deformity .
